markdownRemark.html: Situated in Marbella. Co-ed day ages 11-18. It offers IGCSE, and since Sept 2008 provides the full IB diploma to Sixth Form students. It offers a wide range of extra-curricular activities.

frontmatter.title: Swans Sierra Blanca (Secondary School)

frontmatter.address: C/Lago de Cisnes, Urb. Sierra Blanca, 29602 Marbella, Malaga
